creator: silviocesar@gulbf.com.br
text:
The page exemple comment in anywhere extension file (html, js, php, etc) make
one bug and the page don't start the download for clients outside my network:

One exemple for this see in url:
http://ead.unigranrio.edu.br/teste/filewithcomment.html

The site (Moodle site - www.moodle.org) is ok in http://ead.unigranrio.edu.br/

<html>
<head>
<title>Page with comment bug</title>
</head>
<body>
view before the comment

after this you don't see the page
/***************************************

***************************************/

test


</body>
</html>

/***************************************

***************************************/

It would be helpful if you can send your configuration. If httpd delivers plain
files it does not really about their contents. So I guess you use some kind of
addtional modules / output filters which cause this problem. As I can see from
the site it is using php for example.
creator: rpluem@apache.org
